name: WP Ride Booking
author: GBS Developer

sections.description:
WP Ride Booking: Your Ultimate Solution for Ride and Cab Booking

WP Ride Booking is a versatile WordPress plugin designed for ride booking, travel agencies, and cab booking sites. With seamless integration and robust features, WP Ride Booking enables you to effortlessly manage bookings and accept payments directly through PayPal. With WP Ride Booking, you can create a professional and user-friendly booking platform that meets the needs of your customers and enhance your booking experience. Streamline your booking process, increase customer satisfaction, and grow your business with WP Ride Booking today!

Plugin Settings:

  • PayPal Email ID: Easily configure your PayPal email address to accept secure online payments from customers.
  • Google Map API Key: Integrate Google Maps for accurate route calculation and real-time navigation.
  • Rates per Kilometer: Set customizable rates per kilometer to ensure fair pricing for customers.
  • Get Route Button Text: Customize the text for the “Get Route” button to match your website’s branding and messaging.
  • Google Map Height: Adjust the height of the embedded Google Map to fit seamlessly into your website layout.
  • Currency Selection: Choose from a variety of currencies to accommodate customers from around the world.
  • Color Customization: Personalize the plugin’s appearance with options to set background and text colors.

Key Features:

  • Distance Calculation: Automatically calculates the total distance between two locations, providing accurate fare estimates for customers.
  • Easy Integration: Seamlessly integrate WP Ride Booking into your website using provided shortcodes, making it easy to set up and use.
  • Responsive Design: Enjoy a fully responsive design that adapts to any screen size, ensuring a consistent user experience across devices.
  • Customization Options: Customize the plugin to match your brand’s identity with flexible settings and color options.
  • Secure Payments: Accept secure online payments directly through PayPal, providing peace of mind for both you and your customers.

Shortcode:

[wp-ride-booking]

Free Version Demo:

View Demo of WP Ride Booking Free Version

WP Ride Booking Pro version

WP Ride Booking Pro is the ultimate solution for managing your transportation services seamlessly on your WordPress website. Whether you run a taxi service, limousine rental, or shuttle business, this plugin empowers you to streamline bookings, manage your fleet, and deliver exceptional service to your customers. Our plugin is WooCommerce compatible, allowing anyone to create their online taxi, cab, bus, van, trucks, or any vehicle booking system in a few moments. The plugin allows payment using the default WooCommerce order system, and orders can be viewed in the admin section with all the information of the booking like source, destination, distance, payment mode, order status, and customer information.

WP Ride Booking Pro Features at a glance:

Get Pro Version if you need the following advanced features:

  • Seamless WooCommerce Integration: Enable customers to pay for their travel charges using the trusted WooCommerce checkout system. Benefit from full compatibility with all WooCommerce features, including the use of coupons, tax classes, and more.

  • Advanced Configuration Options:

    • Define distance units (kilometers/miles) to suit your business requirements.
    • Customize vehicle types settings to accurately reflect your fleet.
    • Offer passengers and luggage options to accommodate varying travel needs.

  • Enhanced User Experience:

    • Enjoy a sleek and intuitive admin interface for effortless management of bookings and settings.
    • Allow customers to select journey dates and times with ease, ensuring a smooth booking process.

  • Optimized for Performance and Compatibility:

    • Experience lightning-fast performance and responsiveness across all devices.
    • Enjoy seamless compatibility with any WordPress theme and browser, guaranteeing a consistent experience for all users.

  • Dedicated Support and Updates:

    • Receive 1 year of free support from the date of purchase, providing peace of mind and assistance when you need it most.
    • Benefit from regular updates and improvements to ensure your booking system remains up-to-date and secure.

Why Choose Taxi Booking Pro?

  • Increased Bookings: With online booking and real-time tracking, attract more customers and boost bookings.
  • Efficient Operations: Streamline your taxi service operations, save time, and reduce manual tasks.
  • Improved Customer Experience: Enhance customer satisfaction with a seamless booking process and reliable service.
  • Scalable Solution: Whether you have a small fleet or a large operation, Taxi Booking Pro scales with your business.

Upgrade Today and Elevate Your Transportation Business

With WP Ride Booking Pro, you’ll have everything you need to create a professional, reliable, and customer-friendly transportation booking platform. Enhance the booking experience, streamline operations, and drive growth for your business – all with WP Ride Booking Pro.

Unlock the full potential of your transportation business. Upgrade to WP Ride Booking Pro today!

Pro Version Demo (Basic):

View Demo of WP Ride Booking Pro (Basic)

Pro Version Demo (Advanced):

View Demo of WP Ride Booking Pro (Advanced)

For more information about the premium version of WP Ride Booking, visit our official site https://wpridebooking.com/

Want to hire our professional wordpress developers for your wordpress websites or maintenance?

Contact Us or discuss with us on our live chat.

Note :

Wherever needed we had tried to add cash on delivery method on the demo of our plugin. So don’t use any real payment method while testing our demos of the plugins.
It’s strongly recommend for the users to not to do any transaction and use only cash on delivery for the test transactions on the demos.

Support

We have email and live chat support so you may contact us for any queries regarding the pro version.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Find the Plugin “WP Ride Booking” in Plugins and Activate it.
  3. Use the Settings->WP Ride Booking to configure the booking settings.
sections.changelog:
2.3

  • Updated depreciated funtions and classes
  • Compatible with WordPres 6.5

2.2

  • Solved bug of the autocomplete feature.

2.1

  • Added Payment Mode Settings.
  • Paypal test mode and live mode settings added.

1.7

  • Add currency selector option.
  • Changed screenshots.

1.6

  • Compatible with WordPres 5.7

1.5

  • Compatible with WordPres 5.4.2

1.4

  • Compatible with WordPres 5.3.2

1.3

  • Fix design breaks
  • Updated with latest wordpress version

1.2

  • Added support for decimal values
  • Style changes

1.1

In this updated version of the plugin we have added some new settings for the ease of users.
Here are the updated settings:
1. Setting to change the height of the google map appearing on the front end after searching the route.
2. Setting to change the bacground color of the header and footer of the plugin area in front end.
3. Setting to change the Submit button text background color on hover and normal.

1.0

Initial release

sections.reviews:
Has the pro version more currency options?

By jabraxaaji on January 29, 2022

there are limited currency options, i wanna know has the pro version norwegian krone? if not this plugin is not for me.

Great Plugin! Super helpful support.

By bozulurmu on May 17, 2021

It works perfectly for our business. We had some issues but staff helped us correct the code. 100% worht to buy pro version.

How to change $ To Rs.

By sandesh1987 on February 15, 2018

Plz told me how to chang currency symbol $ to Rs

Like it very much!

By deshmukhneha on December 20, 2017

Awesome plugin....!!! It helped me a lot to create websites for my customers, I mainly deal in building local transport websites and its really awesome plugin for me and definitely I love their paid plugin as well. Though I am not using their paid plugin but of course that is one of the best available source of such type of feature.

Doesn't work on iphone

By dukayn on February 5, 2017

Plugin works on laptop/android phones but doesn't seem to work on iphone calculation is wrong. multiplied by 10 :( in my example: 2euros per km should give 73 Euros (36kms) not 730

Nice Plugin

By akhileshwordpress on September 3, 2016

It is very good plugin, it made my work very easy and smart.
